verses.t: Now{G1161} concerning the things{G4012} whereof{G3739} ye wrote{G1125} unto me{G3427}: It is good{G2570} for a man{G444} not{G3361} to touch{G680} a woman{G1135}.
Nevertheless{G1161}, to avoid fornication{G3588}, let every man{G1538} have{G2192} his own{G1438} wife{G1135}, and{G2532} let every woman{G1538} have{G2192} her own{G2398} husband{G435}.
Let the husband{G3588} render{G591} unto the wife{G3588} due{G3784} benevolence{G2133}: and{G1161} likewise{G3668} also{G2532} the wife{G3588} unto the husband{G3588}.

The wife{G3588} hath{G1850} not{G3756} power{G1850} of her own{G2398} body{G4983}, but{G235} the husband{G3588}: and{G1161} likewise{G3668} also{G2532} the husband{G3588} hath{G1850} not{G3756} power{G1850} of his own{G2398} body{G4983}, but{G235} the wife{G3588}.

Defraud ye{G650} not{G3361} one the other{G240}, except{G1487} it be with{G1537} consent{G4859} for{G4314} a time{G2540}, that{G2443} ye may give yourselves{G4980} to fasting{G3588} and{G2532} prayer{G3588}; and{G2532} come together{G4905} again{G3825}, that{G2443} Satan{G3588} tempt{G3985} you{G5209} not{G3361} for{G1223} your{G5216} incontinency{G3588}.UNSURE: Tagging of "epi auto" with "sunerchomai"
But{G1161} I speak{G3004} this{G5124} by{G2596} permission{G4774}, and not{G3756} of{G2596} commandment{G2003}.

For{G1063} I would{G2309} that all{G3956} men{G444} were{G1511} even{G2532} as{G5613} I myself{G1683}. But{G235} every man{G1538} hath{G2192} his{G2398} proper gift{G5486} of{G1537} God{G2316}, one{G3739} after this manner{G3779}, and{G1161} another{G3739} after that{G3779}.
I say{G3004} therefore{G1161} to the unmarried{G3588} and{G2532} widows{G3588}, It is{G2076} good{G2570} for them{G846} if{G1437} they abide{G3306} even{G5613} as I{G2504}
But{G1161} if{G1487} they{G1467} cannot{G3756} contain{G1467}, let them marry{G1060}: for{G1063} it is{G2076} better{G2908} to marry{G1060} than{G2228} to burn{G4448}.
And{G1161} unto the married{G1060} I command{G3853}, yet not{G3756} I{G1473}, but{G235} the Lord{G3588}, Let not{G3361} the wife{G1135} depart{G5563} from{G575} her husband{G435}:

But{G1161} and{G2532} if{G1437} she depart{G5563}, let her remain{G3306} unmarried{G22}, or{G2228} be reconciled{G2644} to{G3588} her husband{G435}: and{G2532} let{G435} not{G3361} the husband{G435} put away{G863} his wife{G1135}.

But{G1161} to the rest{G3062} speak{G3004} I{G1473}, not{G3756} the Lord{G3588}: If{G1487} any{G5100} brother{G80} hath{G2192} a wife{G1135} that believeth not{G571}, and{G2532} she{G846} be pleased{G4909} to dwell{G3611} with{G3326} him{G846}, let him{G863} not{G3361} put{G863} her away{G846}.NOTE! Extra Word: "autei"

And{G2532} the woman{G1135} which{G3748} hath{G2192} an husband{G435} that believeth not{G571}, and{G2532} if he{G846} be pleased{G4909} to dwell{G3611} with{G3326} her{G846}, let her{G863} not{G3361} leave{G863} him{G846}.

For{G1063} the unbelieving{G571} husband{G3588} is sanctified{G37} by{G1722} the wife{G3588}, and{G2532} the unbelieving{G571} wife{G3588} is sanctified{G37} by{G1722} the husband{G3588}: else{G1893} were{G2076} your{G5216} children{G3588} unclean{G169}; but{G1161} now{G3568} are they{G2076} holy{G40}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} the unbelieving{G571} depart{G5563}, let him depart{G5563}. A brother{G3588} or{G2228} a sister{G3588} is{G3756} not{G3756} under bondage{G1402} in{G1722} such{G5108} cases: but{G1161} God{G3588} hath called{G2564} us{G2248} to{G1722} peace{G1515}.

For{G1063} what{G5101} knowest thou{G1492}, O wife{G1135}, whether{G1487} thou shalt save{G4982} thy husband{G3588}? or{G2228} how{G5101} knowest thou{G1492}, O man{G435}, whether{G1487} thou shalt save{G4982} thy wife{G3588}?

But{G1487} as{G5613} God{G3588} hath distributed{G3307} to every man{G1538}, as{G5613} the Lord{G3588} hath called{G2564} every one{G1538}, so{G3779} let him walk{G4043}. And{G2532} so{G3779} ordain I{G1299} in{G1722} all{G3956} churches{G3588}.

Is{G2564} any man{G5100} called{G2564} being circumcised{G4059}? let him{G1986} not{G3361} become uncircumcised{G1986}. Is{G2564} any{G5100} called{G2564} in{G1722} uncircumcision{G203}? let him{G4059} not{G3361} be circumcised{G4059}.
Circumcision{G3588} is{G2076} nothing{G3762}, and{G2532} uncircumcision{G3588} is{G2076} nothing{G3762}, but{G235} the keeping{G5084} of the commandments{G1785} of God{G2316}.
Let every man{G1538} abide{G3306} in{G1722} the same{G3778} calling{G3588} wherein{G1722} he was called{G2564}.
Art thou called{G2564} being a servant{G1401}? care{G3199} not{G3361} for it{G4671}: but{G235} if{G1487} thou mayest{G1410}be made{G1096} free{G1658}, use{G5530} it rather{G3123}.

For{G1063} he that{G3588} is called{G2564} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}, being a servant{G1401}, is{G2076} the Lord's{G2962} freeman{G558}: likewise{G3668} also{G2532} he that{G3588} is called{G2564}, being free{G1658}, is{G2076} Christ's{G5547} servant{G1401}.
Ye are bought{G59} with a price{G5092}; be{G1096} not{G3361} ye{G1096} the servants{G1401} of men{G444}.
Brethren{G80}, let every man{G1538}, wherein{G1722} he is called{G2564}, therein{G1722} abide{G3306} with{G3844} God{G3588}.

Now{G1161} concerning{G4012} virgins{G3588} I have{G2192} no{G3756} commandment{G2003} of the Lord{G2962}: yet{G1161} I give{G1325} my judgment{G1106}, as{G5613} one that hath obtained mercy{G1653} of{G5259} the Lord{G2962} to be{G1511} faithful{G4103}.
I suppose{G3543} therefore{G3767} that this{G5124} is{G5225} good{G2570} for{G1223} the present{G1764} distress{G318}, I say, that{G3754} it is good{G2570} for a man{G444} so{G3779} to be{G1511}.
Art thou bound{G1210} unto a wife{G1135}? seek{G2212} not{G3361} to be loosed{G3080}. Art thou loosed{G3089} from{G575} a wife{G1135}? seek{G2212} not{G3361} a wife{G1135}.

But{G1161} and{G2532} if{G1437} thou marry{G1060}, thou hast{G264} not{G3756} sinned{G264}; and{G2532} if{G1437} a virgin{G3588} marry{G1060}, she hath{G264} not{G3756} sinned{G264}. Nevertheless{G1161} such{G5108} shall have{G2192} trouble{G2347} in the flesh{G3588}: but{G1161} I{G1473} spare{G5339} you{G5216}.

But{G1161} this{G5124} I say{G5346}, brethren{G80}, the time{G4958} is short{G3588}: it remaineth{G2076}, that{G2532} both{G3588} they that{G2192} have{G1135} wives{G5613} be as{G3361} though{G5600} they had{G5600} none{G2192};

And{G2532} they{G3588} that weep{G2799}, as though{G5613} they wept{G2799} not{G3361}; and{G2532} they{G3588} that rejoice{G5463}, as though{G5613} they rejoiced{G5463} not{G3361}; and{G2532} they{G3588} that buy{G59}, as though{G5613} they possessed{G2722} not{G3361};
And{G2532} they{G3588} that use{G5530} this{G5129} world{G3588}, as{G5613} not{G3361} abusing{G2710} it: for{G1063} the fashion{G3588} of this{G5127} world{G3588} passeth away{G3855}.

But{G1161} I would have{G2309} you{G5209} without carefulness{G275}. He{G3588} that is{G1511} unmarried{G22} careth for{G3309} the things{G3588} that belong to the Lord{G3588}, how{G4459} he may please{G700} the Lord{G3588}:
But{G1161} he{G3588} that is married{G1060} careth for{G3309} the things{G3588} that are of the world{G3588}, how{G4459} he may please{G700} his wife{G3588}.

There is difference{G3307} also between{G3307} a wife{G3588} and{G2532} a virgin{G3588}. The unmarried{G3588} woman careth for{G3309} the things{G3588} of the Lord{G3588}, that{G2443} she may be{G5600} holy{G40} both{G2532} in body{G4983} and{G2532} in spirit{G4151}: but{G1161} she{G3588} that is married{G1060} careth for{G3309} the things{G3588} of the world{G3588}, how{G4459}she may please{G700} her husband{G3588}.

And{G1161} this{G5124} I speak{G3004} for{G4314} your{G5216} own{G846} profit{G4851}; not{G3756} that{G2443} I may cast{G1911} a snare{G1029} upon you{G5213}, but{G235} for{G4314} that which is comely{G2158}, and{G2532} that ye may attend upon{G2145} the Lord{G3588} without distraction{G563}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} any man{G5100} think{G3543} that{G3739} he behaveth{G807} himself{G846} uncomely{G807} toward{G1909} his virgin{G3588}, if{G1437} she pass{G5600} the flower of{G5230} her age{G5230}, and{G2532} need{G3784} so{G3779} require{G1096}, let him do{G4160} what he will{G2309}, he sinneth{G264} not{G3756}: let them marry{G1060}.

Nevertheless{G1161} he that{G3739} standeth{G2476} stedfast{G1476} in{G1722} his heart{G3588}, having{G2192} no{G3361} necessity{G318}, but{G1161} hath{G2192} power{G1849} over{G4012} his own{G2398} will{G2307}, and{G2532} hath{G2919} so{G5124} decreed{G2919} in{G1722} his{G846} heart{G3588} that he will keep{G5083} his{G1438} virgin{G3933}, doeth{G4160} well{G2573}.Extra verb "histeimi"

So{G5620} then{G2532} he{G3588} that giveth{G1547} her in marriage{G1547} doeth{G4160} well{G2573}; but{G1161} he{G3588} that giveth{G1547} her not{G3361} in marriage{G1547} doeth{G4160} better{G2908}.

The wife{G1135} is bound{G1210} by the law{G3551} as{G1909} long{G5550} as{G3745} her{G846} husband{G3588} liveth{G2198}; but{G1161} if{G1437} her{G846} husband{G3588} be dead{G2837}, she is{G2076} at liberty{G1658} to be married to{G1060} whom{G3739} she will{G2309}; only{G3440} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962}.

But{G1161} she is{G2076} happier{G3107} if{G1437} she{G3306} so{G3779} abide{G3306}, after{G2596} my{G1699} judgment{G1106}: and{G1161} I{G2504} think{G1380} also{G2504} that I have{G2192} the Spirit{G4151} of God{G2316}.
